data.lyric:
[ti:Blue Christmas]
[ar:Elvis Presley]
[al:Blue Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Elvis Presley / Blue Christmas - Elvis Presley (猫王)
[00:01.98]I have a blue christmas without you
[00:09.21]
[00:11.62]I be so blue just thinking about you
[00:20.96]
[00:22.99]Decorations of red on a green christmas tree
[00:31.20]
[00:34.61]Wont be the same dear  if your are not here with me
[00:42.01]
[00:42.51]And when those blue snowflakes start falling
[00:50.44]
[00:52.96]Thats when those blue memories start calling
[01:01.37]
[01:05.42]You be doing all right  with your christmas of white
[01:12.83]But I have a blue  blue blue blue christmas
[01:20.10]
[01:44.13]You be doing all right  with your christmas of white 
[01:53.03]But I have a blue  blue bule bule christmas
data.trans:
[ti:Blue Christmas]
[ar:Elvis Presley]
[al:Blue Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.98]我会有一个没有你的蓝色的圣诞节
[00:09.21]
[00:11.62]我会如此忧郁，只是想着你
[00:20.96]
[00:22.99]绿色的圣诞树上点缀着红色饰物
[00:31.20]
[00:34.61]亲爱的，如果你不在我身边，这将会不同
[00:42.01]
[00:42.51]当那些蓝色的雪花开始落下
[00:50.44]
[00:52.96]当那些蓝色的旋律开始奏起
[01:01.37]
[01:05.42]你会比现在更好，你拥有的是白色的圣诞节
[01:12.83]而我拥有的是一个蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的圣诞节
[01:20.10]
[01:44.13]你会比现在更好，你拥有的是白色的圣诞节
[01:53.03]而我拥有的是一个蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的圣诞节
